channel.title: Hostile-PvP 2007 Runescape PvP/dicing/great community!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dQvEFbJ.jpg[/img]
We're a brand new server and already had 12 online.
Download: [url=http://hostile-pvp.com/HostilePVPClient.jar]http://hostile-pvp.com/HostilePVPClient.jar[/url]
[SIZE=4][B]Server Features:[/B][/SIZE] Clipped following Realistic ranged, magic, melee combat formulas Multi-barraging Great hybriding with good item switching Spawn sets that you can use to pk with to make money and gain pkp for better items anti-cheat client system Anti-farming system Dupes are fixed Dicing with 2 6 sides, and dice up to 100 Donator shop with points and benefits Gold, silver, and bronze donator ranks Real 100% working barrow effects with a realistic Dharok max hit formula All bolts work with the effects, and even poison bolts work 250k and 2 pk point reward for each kill Fully working clan chat including clan set up, ranks, kicking members and banning members ::498 and ::474 for those revision game frames Deposit all items in inventory button
[B][SIZE=4]What We're Working On:[/SIZE][/B] Adding all new osrs items More donator benefits Wilderness bossing Maybe world pvp Killstreak system with rewards Working on a close to runescape dfs special and charging
[url=http://hostile-pvp.com]Hostile PvP - Masters are born[/url]
Media:
[Img]http://i.gyazo.com/7787665b779fad78a66c1f52fe0f1a72.png[/img]
[Img]http://i.gyazo.com/ff9517f18510210e8ffdd4c1c4d0b380.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/r08hts.jpg[/img]
Hosting a Pk event when we reach 10 we hit 9 so far!

item.title: Hostile-PvP 2007 Runescape PvP/dicing/great community!
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Quick tip, don’t use gyazo links, try uploading pictures to imgur, tinypic, or any image hosting site and use bbcode (like [img]imgLink[ /img] without the space) to put media. Also, more pictures and information, or people will not join.

Read full topic

item.title: Hostile-PvP 2007 Runescape PvP/dicing/great community!
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

We’re a brand new server and already had 12 online.

Download:
http://hostile-pvp.com/HostilePVPClient.jar

[SIZE=4][B]Server Features:[/B][/SIZE]
Clipped following
Realistic ranged, magic, melee combat formulas
Multi-barraging
Great hybriding with good item switching
Spawn sets that you can use to pk with to make money and gain pkp for better items
anti-cheat client system
Anti-farming system
Dupes are fixed
Dicing with 2 6 sides, and dice up to 100
Donator shop with points and benefits
Gold, silver, and bronze donator ranks
Real 100% working barrow effects with a realistic Dharok max hit formula
All bolts work with the effects, and even poison bolts work
250k and 2 pk point reward for each kill
Fully working clan chat including clan set up, ranks, kicking members and banning members
::498 and ::474 for those revision game frames
Deposit all items in inventory button

[B][SIZE=4]What We’re Working On:[/SIZE][/B]
Adding all new osrs items
More donator benefits
Wilderness bossing
Maybe world pvp
Killstreak system with rewards
Working on a close to runescape dfs special and charging

Hostile PvP - Masters are born

Media:

Hosting a Pk event when we reach 10 we hit 9 so far!

Read full topic
